## Conservation & rarity context

-   **Rarity note:** The wings are divided into several feather-like lobes.

## Natural history notes

The larvae feed on carnivorous plants in the genus Drosera (sundews). It will even eat the sticky hairs of the plant, which normally acts as trap for insects.
